entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Partly cloudy. High minus 36 with temperature falling to minus 40 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 36 with temperature falling to minus 40 in the afternoon.
